full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I 'KHRID YIG 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI ZHAL LUNG GI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I 'GREL PA GSER GYI LDE MIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I 'KHRID YIG 'JAM DPAL DBYANGS KYI ZHAL LUNG GI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I TSIG DON CUNG ZAD PHYE STE BSHAD PA GSER GYI LDE MIG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MKHYEN DPYOD RAB TU YANGS PA AER TE NI SKU SKYES BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYIS BKA' BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, ,'JIG RTEN CHOS BRGYAD KYI KHOL POR RGAS PA GYI NA BA YE SHES SKAL LDAN RNAM RGYAL GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA SLOB MA THA SHAL SU MA TI PRA NYDZ'A BRIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES SKAL LDAN RNAM RGYAL,
